item.description:
Dear friends,

How are you? I hope you all enjoy the winter so far as I do, Sorry for the skier.

Last month, we had a awson discussion. It brings up a lot of deep valuable thoughts. This month, we are going to share more and wish you all can join with me

Thank you and wish you all have a peaceful day

   Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the 2nd building on your right hand side when you drive into condos.You can park any place with sign for guest/ visitor. call me if you can not find it 6172237166
item.name: Westborough Spiritual February Meetup
